Example With Lots of Code

May 15, 2013 - Example-Post

Some code right in the middle <img src="meme.gif"> of a sentence.

Non-highlighted Code

html {
  font-family: $font-family-copy;
  font-size: $font-size-mobile;
  line-height: 1.5;
  padding: 0;

  @media (min-width: $break-point-mobile) {
    font-size: $font-size-desktop;
  }
}

Highlighted Code

<!-- Highlight that shit! -->
<header class="masthead">
  <a href="/">
    <img class="logo" src="/img/me.png" alt="Brandon Schmalz">
  </a>
  <ul class="nav">
    <li><a href="/career/">Career</a></li>
    <li><a href="/personal/">Personal</a></li>
    <li><a href="/posts/">Posts</a></li>
    <li><a href="/contact/">Contact</a></li>
  </ul>
</header>

Add Some Line Numbers

1 def show
2   @widget = Widget(params[:id])
3   respond_to do |format|
4     format.html # show.html.erb
5     format.json { render json: @widget }
6   end
7 end
